resources:
// XML Kid Friendly Austin Skyline image of Austin Image of the place in the list Kid Friendly
// Tabs Eat Play Learn Shop
// Eat Fragment Kerbey Lane Cafe Kids eat free on Tuesdays. 3704 Kerbey Lane, Austin, TX 78731 512.451.1436 www.kerbeylanecafe.com
Phil\'s Ice House Amy\'s Ice Cream. Playground. 2901 S. Lamar Ave, Austin, TX 78704 512.707.8704 www.philsicehouse.com
Mandola\'s Italian Pasta. Gelato. Playground. 4700 Guadalupe St #12, Austin, TX 78751 512.419.9700 www.mandolas.com
Cherrywood Coffeehouse Kids show every Sun at 10am! 1400 E. 38th Â½ St, Austin, TX 78722 512.538.1991 www.cherrywoodcoffeehouse.com
Whole Foods Market Rooftop seating, playground, rink. 525 N. Lamar Blvd, Austin, TX 78703 512.542.2200 www.wholefoodsmarket.com
Lick Honest Ice Creams Pure ingredients. Dairy-free options. 1100 S. Lamar Blvd #1135, Austin, TX 78704 512.363.5622 www.ilikelick.com
// Play Fragment Crux Climbing Center Auto belays! Onsite food trucks. 121 Pickle Rd #100, Austin, TX 78704 512.472.1033 www.cruxclimbingcenter.com
Peter Pan\'s Mini Golf Two 18-hole courses. Cash only! 1207 Barton Springs Rd, Austin, TX 78704 512.472.1033 www.peterpanminigolf.com
Austin Roller Rink Check for kid\'s hours. Arcade. 11600 Manchaca Rd, Austin, TX 78748 512.292.7528 www.austinrollerrink.com
Zilker Zephyr Miniature Train Enjoy a 25-minute ride. Cash only! 2100 Barton Springs Rd, Austin, TX 78704 512.478.8286 www.zilkerpark.org/zilker-park-amenities
Barton Springs Pool Spring-fed. Year-round. 3 acres. 2201 Barton Springs Rd, Austin, TX 78704 512.974.6300 www.austintexas.gov/department/barton-springs_pool
Rowing Dock ATX Be afloat on Lady Bird Lake. 2418 Stratford Dr, Austin, TX 78746 512.459.0999 www.rowingdock.com
// Learn Fragment The Thinkery STEM learning for all ages. 1830 Simond Ave, Austin, TX 78723 512.469.6200 www.thinkeryaustin.org
Austin Central Library Fun children\'s floor with patio. 710 W. Cesar Chavez St, Austin, TX 78701 512.974.7400 www.library.austintexas.gov/central-library
Austin Nature & Science Center Free! Dino pit, birds and animals. 2389 Stratford Dr, Austin, TX 78746 512.974.3888 www.austintexas.gov/department/austin-nature-and-science-center
The Wildflower Center Free for 4 and under. Onsite cafe. 4801 LaCrosse Ave, Austin, TX 78739 512.232.0200 www.wildflower.org
South Congress Bridge Bats Bring blankets. Cover your heads! 100 S. Congress Ave, Austin, TX 78701 512.327.9721 www.batsinaustin.com
Zilker Botanical Garden Trails and gardens. Kids are $1. 2220 Barton Springs Rd, Austin, TX 78704 512.477.8672 www.austintexas.gov/zilkerbotanicalgarden
// Shop Fragment
BookPeople Kids storytime. Onsite cafe. 603 N. Lamar Blvd, Austin, TX 78703 512.472.5050 www.bookpeople.com
Toy Joy Top 10 toy stores in the world! 403 2. 2nd St, Austin, TX 78701 512.320.0090 www.toyjoy.com
Terra Toys Classic. Beautiful. Fun. 2438 Anderson Lane, Austin, TX 78757 512.445.4498 www.terratoys.com
Lions & Tigers & Toys Wooden, green, retro, unique toys. 4301 W. William Cannon Dr #E220, Austin, TX 78749 512.892.7627 www.toystoreaustintx.com
Whole Earth Provisions Outdoor gear for the family. 4477 S. Lamar Blvd, Austin, TX 78745 512.899.0992 www.wholeearthprovision.com
Kid To Kid Best of kids\' resale. 5300 S. Mo Pac Expy, Austin, TX 78749 512.358.0915 www.kidtokid.com
